Description.Name: Trauma Hospital
Description.Details: By using the rest of our space, the Argo has room and infrastructure for actual hospital facilities. If we can add a full trauma surgical team along with a dedicated and sterile operating room, we will be able to bring pilots back from the brink of death. This upgrade will be expensive but having real surgeons on call is imperative to the longevity of our mission and pilots. The costs include maintenance and the salaries for the trauma team of surgeons

AssignedCastDescription: Commander, the medics are excited about more advanced facilities and we now have sufficient power to operate it all. Wow, Commander, we have finally made it to the big time -- we will even have our own surgeons!
